description: A headless Laravel package that1 provides a unified, driver-based scheduling and publishing engine for posting text, images, videos, and slideshows to major social media platforms. The package abstracts platform-specific APIs, media constraints, authentication, and rate limits while remaining queue-first, extensible, and SaaS-ready. We are using this package as a starting point: packages\mixpost-auth and packages\mixpost. The env variable names are set as follows # Meta MIXPOST_FACEBOOK_CLIENT_ID= MIXPOST_FACEBOOK_CLIENT_SECRET= # X MIXPOST_TWITTER_CLIENT_ID= MIXPOST_TWITTER_CLIENT_SECRET= # LinkedIn MIXPOST_LINKEDIN_CLIENT_ID= MIXPOST_LINKEDIN_CLIENT_SECRET= # TikTok MIXPOST_TIKTOK_CLIENT_KEY= MIXPOST_TIKTOK_CLIENT_SECRET= # YouTube MIXPOST_YOUTUBE_CLIENT_ID= MIXPOST_YOUTUBE_CLIENT_SECRET= # Pinterest MIXPOST_PINTEREST_CLIENT_ID= MIXPOST_PINTEREST_CLIENT_SECRET= # Telegram MIXPOST_TELEGRAM_BOT_TOKEN=. Use the database tables in this repo which start with mixpost_. Put the new code in packages\mixpost and follow the same conventions as packages\mixpost\src\SocialProviders.

userStories.description: As a developer, I want to schedule a post to TikTok so that videos or slideshows are published automatically at a specified time.
acceptanceCriteria: System accepts a scheduled TikTok post payload containing video or slideshow media
A successful POST request is made to the TikTok publishing API
TikTok API returns a successful response and a platform post ID
Post status is marked as published

userStories.description: As a developer, I want a unified scheduling API so that I can schedule one piece of content across multiple platforms.
acceptanceCriteria: A single scheduling request fans out to multiple platform drivers
Each platform executes independently
Partial failures do not block other platforms
Statuses are tracked per platform

userStories.description: As a developer, I want platform authentication and token refresh to be handled automatically so that scheduled posts do not fail due to expired tokens.
acceptanceCriteria: OAuth tokens are stored securely

Posting succeeds after token refresh without manual intervention
